sentence.Network_en: Comfort your hearts, and stablish you in every good and work.
sentence.Network_cn: 安慰你们的心, 并且在一切善行善言上,坚固你们.

sentence.Network_en: But the Lord is faithful, who shall stablish you and keep you from evil.
sentence.Network_cn: 3但主是信实的, 要坚固你们,保护你们脱离那恶者.(或作:脱离凶恶).

sentence.Network_en: KJV Be ye also patient; stablish your hearts : for the coming of the Lord draweth nigh.
sentence.Network_cn: [新译]你们也应当忍耐, 坚定自己的心;因为主再来的日子近了.
